data.sentence: The word أَوْ comes from the root ا و and is associated with the meanings: or

data.meanings: to beg pardon, to excuse, to free anyone from guilt or blame, excuse/plea, those who put forth excuses, apologists.
data.sentence: The word عُذْرًا comes from the root ع ذ ر and is associated with the meanings: to beg pardon, to excuse, to free anyone from guilt or blame, excuse/plea, those who put forth excuses, apologists.

data.meanings: (Nun-Thal-Ra) to dedicate, make a vow, warn, admonish, caution, promise voluntarily, offer present. nadhiir - warner, one who informs and averts calamity, who cautions and put one on guard.
data.sentence: The word نُذْرًا comes from the root ن ذ ر and is associated with the meanings: (Nun-Thal-Ra) to dedicate, make a vow, warn, admonish, caution, promise voluntarily, offer present. nadhiir - warner, one who informs and averts calamity, who cautions and put one on guard.
